title: [BUG REPORT] Quinn's R/Teemo shroom interaction,
body:
Quinn's R specifies that when taking champion damage, she will exit tag team with Valor. However i was flying through the river and hit a shroom and was slowed but did not exit the tag team, this happened on multiple occasions.

P.S. Quite happy to keep it how it is (fuck teemo) but thought i would bring it to attention, as i don't want to win by taking advantage of bugs.

replies.body: well, pets (which is whats teemo's r is classified as (who knows god god damn why)) dont exit tag team, only damage directly from the champ cancels it

Technically, Teemo's shrooms are classified as traps, but only champion/turret damage causes Tag Team (or should I say "Behind Enemy Lines", wtf Rito?) to end. I think it's a little vague though because Teemo's shrooms are still his damage. If traps/pets from champions don't cause Tag Team to end it should be specified somewhere, after all Riot is all about Clarity...

yes, but "traps" are also registered as "pets" by the tag team code. 

Shaco w, Heimer q, teemo r etc, dont seem to cancel it, as well as debuffs that don't actually bring harm to quinn, such as fiddle's q or fizz r (before shark attacks)
